name: Sleepy Owls Baby Blanket
description: Sweet little barn owls inspired this baby blanket design. I imagined them perched in a row, getting ready for one last flight before saying good night. This blanket makes a wonderful gift for a special little person in your life!
sizes_available: One size, 23x30 inches, with instructions to customize size
full_text: Sweet little barn owls inspired this baby blanket design. I imagined them perched in a row, getting ready for one last flight before saying good night. This blanket makes a wonderful gift for a special little person in your life! Pattern is designed for a 23x30 inches blanket, perfect for a crib or in a stroller. The pattern includes instructions to customize its size and make the blanket smaller or larger as desired. Yarn and notions: Yarn: 600 yards (approximately 250 g) DK weight yarn Sample in Silk/Yak DK, by Alley Cat Yarns Colourway: Au Naturel Alley Cat Yarns website: https://alleycatyarns.ca/collections/silk-yak-dk Needles: 4mm circulars with a 32’’ cable Other notions: cable needle, stitch markers, scissors, darning needle Gauge: 21 sts = 4 inches in stockinette
